dmca.title: Fraud site - www.escrowlinkinc.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 24, 2005 7:38 PM
To: Andrea; abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Cc: ifcc33@ic3.gov; la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.escrowlinkinc.com
Importance: High



It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.escrowlinkinc.com
<http://www.escrowlinkinc.com/>  

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.escrowlinkinc.com, which is infringing
on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the material posted on
Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  They claim an
affiliation with our companies and have taken content from our site.  Please
disable this site immediately.

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.escrowlinkinc.com <http://www.escrowlinkinc.com/>   site,
http://escrowlinkinc.com/solutions.php?articol=9  Neither Escrow.com nor IES
has any affiliation with www.escrowlinkinc.com
<http://www.escrowlinkinc.com/>  , and has a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.

 

 

 



 

Brandon W. Abbey

Managing Director

Escrow.com

16275 Laguna Canyon Road

Irvine, CA  92618

Direct - 949-790-5880

Fax - 949-790-5811
